summary.overview: This JCL job establishes a Generation Data Group (GDG) structure for managing daily rejection files in the card demo system. It creates a data management framework that automatically maintains up to 5 versions of rejection records with automatic cleanup of older versions.
business_functions: Create Generation Data Group for daily rejection file management
Configure automatic retention of 5 most recent rejection file versions
Enable automatic deletion of oldest rejection files when storage limit is exceeded
Establish systematic version control for daily card processing rejection data

DALYREJS.jcl.program_overview: IBM utility for defining and managing Generation Data Groups

datasource_summary.name: Daily Rejections File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.DALYREJS)
datasource_summary.function: Stores daily rejection records from card demo application processing. Maintains up to 5 generations with automatic deletion of oldest generation when limit is exceeded.

flow_diagram_code:
